column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday August 8 at 6:30 a.m.

column4: All inbound lanes are shut down at Aristides Blvd until further notice due to a serious collision.
Inbound traffic is being diverted to Aristides Blvd to McGrathiana Pkwy to Citation Blvd.
Motorists on I-75 should use Exit 113 (Paris Pike) if planning travel toward downtown Lexington.
